summary: This function creates a SQL SELECT statement based on the provided input. It can be passed in pickle format and should be implemented in Haskell.

details.comment: This function creates a SQL SELECT statement based on the provided input. It can be passed in pickle format and should be implemented in Haskell.
details.content:
def sqlMaker(sauce):
    sql = "SELECT * FROM "+sauce+" ;"
    # you can pass it in pickle format.
    # do it in haskell.
    return sql
